thread.title: Mahesh Bhatt, Shabana Azmi condemn attack on Sudheendra Kulkarni
thread.title_full: Mahesh Bhatt, Shabana Azmi condemn attack on Sudheendra Kulkarni - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Mahesh Bhatt, Shabana Azmi condemn attack on Sudheendra Kulkarni
text:
Criticising the paint smearing attack on ORF chairman Sudheendra Kulkarni , Bollywood celebrities Shabana Azmi, Mahesh Bhatt among others, called it a shameful incident for a democratic country like India.
Shiv Sena activists today smeared black paint on the chairman of think tank Observer Research Foundation for refusing to ... Â»
